title: Pandora's Box and Other Problems
description: Fourteen-year-old Pandora Birch lives with her father in the small town of Whitewater, Pennsylvania. Her mother left the family when Pandora was a baby, and ever since then her life has been rather boring. That all changes after a sleepover with her friend Erica turns into the discovery of an old puzzle box in the attic. Follow Pandora and her friends as they discover the secrets of the box, and revelations that will change and influence Pandora's life forever...
author: Anna Grace Bolland
